metadata.title: Thursday,13th June, 2024
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) when rehabilitation works on the Zampalm-Macheleta-Nchubula road in Kanchibiya Parliamentary Constituency will commence;
(b) what the time frame for the completion of the project, is;
(c) how many bridges are earmarked for construction along the road;
(d) who the contractor for the project, is; and
(e) what the cost of the project is.
(a) how regularly schools are funded by the Government;
(b) how the funds are utilised; and
(c) how school pupils and communities benefit from the funding.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a canal to connect Katonga and Lulimala Wards in Chitambo Parliamentary Constituency to the Luapula River;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Small and Medium Enterprise Development
parts: (a) how many beneficiaries of the Citizens’ Economic Empowerment Fund there were in the following localities, as of December, 2023:
(i) Choma District; (ii) Mbabala Parliamentary Constituency; (iii) Mapanza Chiefdom in Choma District; and (iv) Macha Chiefdom in Choma District;
(b) how much money was disbursed in each locality at (a), as of December, 2023; and

(c) whether the Government has any plans to increase the number of beneficiaries in Mbabala Parliamentary Constituency. 7.
